info.task: navigate to last unchecked radio button in group
info.title: navigate to the last unchecked radio button in a group in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterRadioGroup
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the radio group
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the radio group
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: Navigate to the last radio button in the group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the radio button and group.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the last radio button in the group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the radio button and group.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Name of the group, 'Pizza Crust', is conveyed
name of the radio button, 'Thin crust', is conveyed
State of the radio button, 'unchecked', is conveyed
Position of the radio button, 3, is conveyed
Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
